Description: Foot sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery kernos with part of body; white slip; interior: glazed black on body and black horizontal stripes on foot; exterior: chequer pattern with dotted blanks; below, on toe, ray pattern; sides glazed black with, at toe, white square with dotted cross; underside: lengthwise black stripes.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p.24, p.249, no.355)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2180) (phase 2)
